Uses of Class
org.pepstock.charba.client.intl.enums.MeasureUnit

  • Packages that use MeasureUnit 
    Package Description
    org.pepstock.charba.client.defaults
    Contains all interfaces need to provide defaults values of the chart options.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.defaults.globals
    Contains the default values of chart options for all chart types (CHART.JS options defaults).
    org.pepstock.charba.client.intl
    Contains classes in order to use the ECMAScript Internationalization API, which provides language sensitive number formatting, and date and time formatting.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.intl.enums
    Contains enumerations to use in order to configure the ECMAScript Internationalization API options.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.options
    Contains all elements to configure charts at global level (know as chart global options).

    • Uses of MeasureUnit in org.pepstock.charba.client.defaults

      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client.defaults that return types with arguments of type MeasureUnit 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<MeasureUnit> IsDefaultNumberFormatOptions.getUnitsOfMeasure()
      Returns an unmodifiable list of units to use in unit formatting.

    • Uses of MeasureUnit in org.pepstock.charba.client.intl

      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client.intl that return types with arguments of type MeasureUnit 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<MeasureUnit> NumberFormatOptions.getUnitsOfMeasure()
      Returns an unmodifiable list of units to use in unit formatting.

      PAY ATTENTION
      This method is not supported on Safari.
      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client.intl with parameters of type MeasureUnit 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void NumberFormatOptions.setUnitsOfMeasure(MeasureUnit... units)
      Sets the unit to use in unit formatting.
      If more that 1 unit has been passed, a compound unit has been created.

      PAY ATTENTION
      This method is not supported on Safari.
      Method parameters in org.pepstock.charba.client.intl with type arguments of type MeasureUnit 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void NumberFormatOptions.setUnitsOfMeasure(List<MeasureUnit> units)
      Sets the unit to use in unit formatting.
      If more that 1 unit has been passed, a compound unit has been created.

      PAY ATTENTION
      This method is not supported on Safari.
